text: Allahale e'uta bastiko udaharana varnana gardacha juna purnasanti ra suraksama thiyo, pratyeka disabata usako jivikako paripurti hunthyo pheri allahako varadanaharuprati usale krtadhnata prakata garyo, ani allahale tiniharuko kriyakalapako karanale badalama tiniharula'i bhukha ra darako svada cakha'ihalyo
